label_flashsale_no_selling_out_item: Hiện tại chưa có sản phẩm nào bán cháy hàng. Vui lòng kiểm tra lại sau
seo_flash_sale_description: Cơ hội mua sắm online giá hủy diệt, nhiều khuyến mãi hấp dẫn, miễn phí vận chuyển toàn quốc. Số lượng có hạn. Săn flash sale ngay!
seo_flash_sale_description_in: Buy products with huge discounts online on new hot deals daily! Enjoy great online deals with good quality at low prices by Shopee {{locale}}! Stretch your dollar with huge discounts on selected products, offered for limited-time periods, while stocks last!
seo_flash_sale_description_mx: ¡Maximiza tu dinero con las Ofertas Relámpago de Shopee Malasia! ¡Con los Precios Más Bajos Garantizados, puedes comprar tus productos ideales con megadescuentos! Apúrate y disfruta de nuestras ofertas por tiempo limitado en productos seleccionados hasta que el stock se agote.
seo_flash_sale_description_my: Maximise your value with Shopee Malaysia's Shocking Sale! With Lowest Prices Guaranteed, you can buy your ideal goods at mega discounts! Hurry and enjoy our limited-time deals on selected products while stocks last.
seo_flash_sale_description_ph: Great online deals with good quality at low prices by Shopee Philippines. Grab promotions with huge discounts and voucher codes on new flash deals daily!
seo_flash_sale_description_sg: Enjoy Lowest Prices Guaranteed with Shopee Singapore's daily Flash Deals. Stretch your dollar with huge discounts on selected products, offered for limited-time periods, while stocks last!
seo_flash_sale_title: Flash Sale - Giá Tốt, Ưu Đãi Khủng | Shopee Việt Nam
